name: Finding the effective range of your Airsoft gun
name_original: Finding the effective range of your Airsoft gun
description: Effective range is one that is meaningful - when outside of this range the BB would start to accelerate downward from your line of aim.  We assume there is a correlation between the FPS rating and the effective range given a reasonable airsoft configuration. This app will help you find out the effective range given a particular FPS rating.
